languages.text: After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total wounds within one round, a character will receive a fresh injury. Injuries reduce characters' resolve. If three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into a trauma.
languages.original_text: Попав в ловушку или получив урон, превосходящий 50% от общего здоровья, за один раунд, персонаж получает свежее ранение. Ранения уменьшают решимость персонажа. Когда ранений становится три или больше, персонаж получает травму.

traits.locale_text: After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total wounds within one round, a character will receive a fresh injury. Injuries reduce characters' resolve. If three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into a trauma.

After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total wounds within one round, a character will receive a fresh injury. Injuries reduce characters' resolve. If three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into a trauma.

After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total wounds within one round, a character will receive a fresh injury. Injuries reduce characters' resolve. If three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into a trauma.

languages.text: Al caer en una trampa o recibir daño que supere el 50 % de sus heridas totales en un solo asalto, los personajes reciben una lesión reciente. Las lesiones reducen la firmeza de los personajes. Si acumulan tres o más lesiones, se convierten en una aflicción.
languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total wounds within one round, a character will receive a fresh injury. Injuries reduce characters' resolve. If three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into a trauma.

traits.locale_text: Al caer en una trampa o recibir daño que supere el 50 % de sus heridas totales en una sola ronda, los personajes reciben una lesión reciente. Las lesiones reducen el brío de los personajes. Si acumulan tres o más lesiones, se convierten en una aflicción.

languages.text: 如果角色落入陷阱，或单回合内受到的伤害超过总生命值的50%，角色就会承受一处新伤。伤势会降低角色的决心。如果某个角色累计承受三处伤势，则会受到创伤效果影响。
languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total wounds within one round, a character will receive a fresh injury. Injuries reduce characters' resolve. If three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into a trauma.

traits.locale_text: 如果角色落入陷阱，或单回合内受到的伤害超过总生命值的50%，角色就会承受一处新的伤势。伤势会降低角色的决心。如果某个角色累计承受三处伤势，则会受到创伤效果影响。

languages.text: 罠にハマったり、1ラウンド以内に総体力の50%を超えるダメージを受けたりすると、キャラクターは生傷を受ける。負傷はキャラクターの決意を低下させる。負傷が3つ以上蓄積すると、外傷に変わる。
languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total wounds within one round, a character will receive a fresh injury. Injuries reduce characters' resolve. If three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into a trauma.

traits.locale_text: 罠にハマったり、1ラウンド以内に総体力の50%を超えるダメージを受けたりすると、キャラクターは生傷を受ける。負傷はキャラクターの決意を低下させる。負傷が3つ以上蓄積すると、トラウマに変わる。

languages.text: Wenn ein Charakter in eine Falle getappt ist oder innerhalb einer Runde Schaden erlitten hat, der mehr als 50 % seiner gesamten Wunden überschreitet, erhält er eine frische Verletzung. Verletzungen verringern die Entschlossenheit der Charaktere. Wenn sich drei oder mehr Verletzungen anhäufen, werden sie zu einem Trauma.
languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total wounds within one round, a character will receive a fresh injury. Injuries reduce characters' resolve. If three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into a trauma.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Charakter in eine Falle getappt ist oder innerhalb einer Runde Schaden erlitten hat, der mehr als 50% seiner gesamten Wunden überschreitet, erhält er eine frische Verletzung. Verletzungen verringern die Entschlossenheit der Charaktere. Wenn sich drei oder mehr Verletzungen anhäufen, werden sie zu einem Trauma.

languages.text: Après être tombé dans un piège ou avoir subi des dégâts supérieurs à 50 % de sa réserve totale de blessures au cours d'un même round, un personnage reçoit une lésion récente. Les lésions réduisent la détermination des personnages. Tout cumul d'au moins trois lésions se transforme en traumatisme.
languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total wounds within one round, a character will receive a fresh injury. Injuries reduce characters' resolve. If three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into a trauma.

traits.locale_text: Après être tombé dans un piège ou avoir subi des dégâts supérieurs à 50 % de sa réserve totale de blessures au cours d'un même round, un personnage reçoit une blessure récente. Les blessures réduisent la détermination des personnages. Tout cumul d'au moins trois blessures se transforme en traumatisme.

languages.text: Попав в ловушку или получив урон, превосходящий 50% от общего здоровья, за один раунд, персонаж получает свежее ранение. Ранения уменьшают решимость персонажа. Когда ранений становится три или больше, персонаж получает травму.
